welcome_message_body: "Welcome to South Euclid, a charming city known for its beautiful parks and friendly community. We invite you to explore and experience all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Burke Lakefront Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for internet access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hopkins International Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Hopkins International Airport serves mainly domestic flights operated by United Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Hopkins International Airport serves mainly domestic flights operated by American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C at Hopkins International Airport serves mainly domestic and international flights operated by Delta Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.
